data.title: Markdown Support Example
data.subtitle: Authoring content with Markdown
data.content:
## Why Markdown?

Markdown is a lightweight markup language that you can use to add formatting elements to plain text text documents. Created by John Gruber in 2004, Markdown is now one of the world's most popular markup languages.

### Features

*   **Easy to ready:** No complex tags.
*   **Portable:** Can be converted to HTML, PDF, etc.
*   **Fast:** Write without lifting your fingers from the keyboard.

Here is a list of things:

1.  First item
2.  Second item
3.  Third item

And some code:

```javascript
console.log('Hello, Markdown!');
```

> Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible.
